job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongRole Description Data Scientist  Sr Consultant  AIstrongppAs a AI TranslatorSr ConsultantAI on the Data Science team you will play a critical role in ideating developing and then implementing advanced analytics solution in production You will be helping business leaders identify and prioritize their business problems based on value creation and Business ROI These may be opportunities within a single line of business or crossorganizational initiatives This role helps in bridging the technical expertise of Data Scientists with the operation expertise of frontline managers thereby ensuring that the deep insights generated through sophisticated analytics translate into impact at scale in an organizationppnbspppPotential hires are expected to own the endtoend process from development into implementation which involves data extraction feature engineering model building and model testing along with documentationppstrongnbspstrongppstrongRole and problemsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspGive thought leadership on problem definition and defining the key metrics to targetppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to translate a business problem into digital and analytics problemppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspOwn the problem and integrate design analytics and engineering capabilities to deliver impactful solution to client problemsppnbspppstrongData Analytics and InsightsstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspUnderstand client and businessstrong strongdomain and integrate client business issues with data insightsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to analyze business metrics perform data analysis to generate and deliver impactful insights and
